actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to convey to the State of Hawaii certain lands within the Fort Ruger Military Reservation, Hawaii, for educational purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to convey to the State of Hawaii specified lands within the Fort Ruger Military Reservation, Hawaii, for educational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to convey to the State of Hawaii certain lands within the Fort Ruger Military Reservation, Hawaii, for educational purposes.
